oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: German Hypnotist
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Magicians
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple color one sheet depicting a hypnotist in front of a statue. Two question marks surround the statue. The image on the poster was designed by Escher and printed by Graph Kunstanstalt, F. X. Schroff in Augsburg, Germany.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Escher
